body.name: Colgate Travel Toothbrush, Soft, 12 Pack

features: Easy-to-carry travel toothbrush folds into a compact size, occupying minimum space
Cover flips over the folded brush to keep bristles clean wherever you go
Specifically designed for your travel, sports, and work needs
Has two levels of bristles that fit the contours of your teeth to clean the surface and in between
body.description: The Colgate Travel Soft Toothbrush cleans teeth on the go! It is specifically designed for your travel, sports, and work needs. This easy-to-carry travel toothbrush folds into a compact size, occupying minimum space. A cover flips over the folded brush to keep bristles clean wherever you go. It is designed with two levels of bristles that fit the contours of your teeth to clean the surface and in between.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us At Colgate, we believe that “Everyone deserves a future to smile about”. In a world full of changes and opportunities, we believe an optimistic outlook can go a long way in fulfilling your aspirations and we hope to inspire this optimism in everyone, everyday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Travel Companion - Colgate Travel Toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: I recently had the opportunity to try out the Colgate Travel Toothbrush, and I must say, it exceeded my expectations as a travel essential. Here’s why I love it:Portability: The compact design of this toothbrush makes it incredibly easy to pack for trips. It doesn’t take up much space in my toiletry bag, leaving more room for other essentials.Quality Bristles: Despite its small size, the Colgate Travel Toothbrush boasts high-quality bristles that effectively clean my teeth. I didn’t experience any discomfort or irritation while brushing, which is essential for maintaining oral hygiene on the go.Protective Cover: One of my favorite features is the included protective cover. It keeps the bristles clean and prevents them from touching other items in my bag. This attention to hygiene is a big plus for me.Durability: I’ve used this toothbrush for several trips now, and it has held up remarkably well. It’s sturdy and can withstand the rigors of travel without any issues.Affordable: The Colgate Travel Toothbrush is budget-friendly, making it an excellent choice for anyone who travels frequently. You get a reliable toothbrush without breaking the bank.Overall, I highly recommend the Colgate Travel Toothbrush to fellow travelers. It’s a practical, reliable, and affordable option that ensures you can maintain your oral hygiene no matter where your adventures take you. Happy travels and happy brushing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for travel
reviews.reviewText: Love these toothbrushes for travel. They fold to half size in their handle-case for travel, great bristle head, easy to use. I take one in my carry-on and another in my packed luggage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value and do the job
reviews.reviewText: This was a good deal for a box of travel toothbrushes, each individually packaged. The bristles are on the firm side, which my hubby loves but I just tolerate while traveling. They fold easily and handle is sufficiently comfy/strong.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought For The Whole Family
reviews.reviewText: Just right stiffness, and, sturdily built. Love the handle seconding as a toothbrush case. Always misplacing the others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy little toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: We’ve used these travel toothbrushes on multiple occasions. Very handy. It’s great to be able to cover the toothbrush heads while using bathrooms away from home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and function
reviews.reviewText: Such a clever, convenientdesign and high quality product. I'm a big fan for traveling purposes, or just for life with kids whose toothbrushes can end up just about anywhere it seems. It's very sturdy in full extension position.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great value, but NOT soft
reviews.reviewText: Got the 12 pack travel brushes so I can keep some at work since I have braces. Great price! However, these are labeled 'soft', but are the least soft toothbrushes I've ever used. The way they fold up feels a little clumsy, but it's not the worst. The value is great, but if you want a brush that's actually soft, this isn't it.
Muy buenos pero esperaba más colores

reviews.reviewTitle: It fits well in my trouser or shirt pockets
reviews.reviewText: Pro: It fits well in my trouser or shirt pockets
Very handy for travelling as it negates the need for a separate case for your toothbrush. Soft bristles and head just the right size.
Just what I have been looking for, a travel toothbrush that is compact and lightweight, also it has its own foldable cover.
